name: modulo
author: Francesco Di Maggio
description: A Toolkit for Tinkering with Digital Musical Instruments. Think of it as a "Lego" set for your musical ideas. Each module is designed with simplicity and versatility in mind, where core functionalities (and patching) are housed within a compact and user-friendly interface. You can mix and match, customize, and extend your own musical tools in a modular and multichannel workflow.
